text: Manage your risk to COVID-19 and track your symptoms with myDiya's COVID-19 Symptom Tracker.
If you think you have been exposed to COVID-19, you can record the incident in your myDiya account, including any symptoms you may be experiencing.
You can easily track your symptoms' progression with myDiya's visual charts, which are automatically populated once you update your symptoms.
If your symptoms worsen, easily share your records with your physician via myDiya.
To learn more about myDiya's COVID-19 tracking capabilities, watch the following video.
